name: Ninja Training Camp (Romain Salha, KevitoMK14, Seboy, LuckMk1)
name_original: Ninja Training Camp (Romain Salha, KevitoMK14, Seboy, LuckMk1)
description:
Play the game in FULL SCREEN !

Ninja Training Camp

Ninja Training Camp is a 2D platformer which will make you think outside the box to beat its levels. 

Help Satoru complete his training and reach the goal with increasingly restricted tools. Prove to your sensei that you are worthy!

Dev team
  • Romain Salha
  • Rémi Espie
  • Arthur Sapin
  • Sébastien Boyer
  • Kévin Morneau

Suppervised by Yannick Francillette
